sentences.en: De - ice the plane's wings before takeoff.
sentences.cn: 起飞前除去机翼上的冰.

sentences.en: Discovery's takeoff this morning from Cape Canaveral was flawless.
sentences.cn: “发现”号航天飞机今晨从卡纳维拉尔角顺利发射升空。

sentences.en: Gwen Meighen occupied with pre - takeoff rituals.
sentences.cn: 桂温·米恩忙于起飞前的一些繁文缛节.

sentences.en: Kuznets also doubts the validity of the notion of'self - sustaining growth " initiated in the takeoff stage.
sentences.cn: 库茨涅兹还怀疑起飞阶段中最初的“ 自我 保持增长 ” 的观点是否可信.

sentences.en: Officials say that one or two engines fell away from the plane shortly after takeoff.
sentences.cn: 官员们说飞机起飞后不久就有一两台引擎脱落了。

sentences.en: She does a marvellous takeoff of the Queen.
sentences.cn: 她学女王的样子学得惟妙惟肖.

sentences.en: She gave permission to the plane to taxi into position and hold for takeoff.
sentences.cn: 她发出指令，允许飞机滑行入位，准备起飞。

sentences.en: Sixteen hours after takeoff, the Vimy's wheels touched ground.
sentences.cn: 起飞后十六个小时, “维米号”的双轮着陆了.

sentences.en: The commuter plane was waiting for takeoff.
The plane crashed shortly after takeoff.
sentences.cn: 飞机起飞后不久便坠毁了.

sentences.en: The plane roared down the runway for takeoff.
sentences.cn: 飞机轰鸣着沿着跑道疾驰，准备起飞。

sentences.en: The plane was returning to the airport soon after takeoff when it burst into flames.
sentences.cn: 飞机起飞之后不久便起火，于是掉头返回机场。

sentences.en: The programme was worth watching for an inspired takeoff of the Collins sisters.
sentences.cn: 这个节目值得一看，因为有对柯林斯姐妹的滑稽创意模仿。

sentences.en: When all the instruments had been checked out, the pilot signalled that he was ready for takeoff.
sentences.cn: 所有仪表都检查过之后, 驾驶员发出起飞准备就绪的信号.

sentences.en: You are not allowed to smoke until after takeoff.
sentences.cn: 飞机起飞之前你不得抽烟.

trans.tran_cn: （飞机的）起飞，<喻>（经济的）起飞，开始，起跳
trans.tran_en: Takeoff is the beginning of a flight, when an aircraft leaves the ground
